spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Elizar is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Elizar has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast {@spell conjure minor elementals}. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

action.name: Dagger +1
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
